Immunoprecipitation assay.EditorialNote: OBI has immunoprecipitation under "process";  we insert "assay" in between process and immunoprecipitation.  Not sure what to do here.
Immunoprecipitation assay.Comment: OBI definition:  a process which realizes a material separation objective by relying on antibodies to specifically bind to a material entity
Immunoprecipitation assay.Definition: An assay by which an antigen is precipitated from solution using an antibody.
